patthana22.3:1.1_0: Nakusalaṁ nahetusampayuttaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca akusalo hetusampayutto dhammo uppajjati
patthana22.3:1.1_1: hetupaccayā. Nakusalaṁ nahetusampayuttaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca abyākato hetusampayutto
patthana22.3:1.1_2: dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Naakusalaṁ nahetusampayuttaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca abyākato
patthana22.3:1.1_3: hetusampayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … cha. (Sahetukasadisaṁ. Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana22.3:2.1: Nakusalaṁ nahetuvippayuttaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca abyākato hetuvippayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … cha. (Ahetukasadisaṁ. Saṅkhittaṁ.)
